title: Sex Objects in the Sky
itunes:title: Sex Objects in the Sky
description:
As commercial airlines took off, so did the fetishizing of the white, eligible stewardesses on board. Cristen and Caroline discuss the original stewardesses, how sex sold airline tickets and flight attendants' fight for professional recognition.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
